name: Barna Word Processor Document
summary: Learn about .BNA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Barna was originally developed for DOS and is no longer developed or sold.

description: Text document created with Barna, a word processing program for the Bangla language; uses the Bangla ("Bengali") font and supports Munir, Bijoy, and Easy keyboards as well as custom keyboard layouts.
